extendedInfo.description: Find your phone when it is misplaced and muted! Upgrade the app to get GPS Tracking. This is probably one of the easiest to use "Find your phone" apps on the market. "Find your phone" listens on incoming SMS messages. If the message is a special word of your choosing it will do the following:- Disable silent mode - Adjust the volume to max. - Play an alarm sound of your choice. - Chose from different sounds (Star Wars R2D2 Included!)- Find phone by making it ring/vibrate!Now also with Location tracking. This feature can be purchased from within the app. Unlike many other apps of this kind, no smart phone is needed to see the location of your lost phone.GPS Tracking for your phone works like this2) You use somebody elses phone to send a text message with a pre-defined keyword to your own phone3) Your phone will reply to the message with a link to a webpage, containing a map with your phone's location.4) The text message also contains the estimated accuracy for the location.5) Because the location is sent as reference to a webpage with a map, no Android phone is needed to see the map. Any browser on any phone will do. 6) The location is based on the phone's last known location from the Network operator provider. The location fix is very fast.** If the app does not work on your phone, please email me at glenn.bech@gmail.com so I can try to fix it. ** ** If you upgrade to GPS tracking and you can't get it to work, I will gladly refund the purchase. **Keywords:* GPS Location phone* Find lost phone* GPS tracking for phone * Find my phone* Phone locator app

reviews.title: Pretty good app
reviews.comment: This app is pretty good. I\'m sure it will be helpful when I lose my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work with Samsung Epic 4G
reviews.comment: Sadly, the app does not work with Samsung Epic 4G on Sprint. My three year old is constantly playing with my phone and putting it down... somewhere.
reviews.author: Gabis Daddi

reviews.comment: The test worked then tried to do it again of my friends phone a few times and it doesnt work....shame cis its just what i need
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Worked first time I tested - with volume on - tried test with phone muted and now will not work no matter what I do. Shame because it\'s exactly what I was looking for, if it would work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 2cnd use made me rate app and can\'t exit out of screen afterwards.  Now I am uninstalling......since I can\'t exit to get back to my phone home\tWorks, but needs more sounds to use.  Maybe be able to use notification sounds or ringtones stored on phone
